short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful tooling to engage live chat on Youtube, Twitch, Zoom, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture and consolidate the live chat from over 100 sites into a single dashboard.

Use the chat for video production overlays, text-to-speech, polls, interactive games, and more. You can also respond to multiple sites at once, relay messages from site to site, and more.

100% free, open-sourced, no data-collection, and data is kept private by use of peer-to-peer technology. 

This is the Manifest Version 3 edition, which will be replacing the MV2 version by end of year.
